settings.title: IDA Design
settings.text: The Desk Combines Interactive Visualization, Cable Management, And Motion Control.

settings.title: K Design
settings.text: The Desk Visualizes In-Game Interactions. It Provides E-Sports Enthusiasts With An Immersive Gaming Experience.

settings.title: MUSE Design
settings.text: Users Can Store And Recall Commonly Used Heights With A Single Button.

settings.title: Lifting Speed Of Up To 1.5in/S
settings.text: High Torque Allows For Quick Starts And Responses Within Milliseconds Of The Command.

settings.title: Height Adjustment 28” - 54”
settings.text: height range from 28” to 54” gives you the flexibility to transition effortlessly from sitting to standing for the ultimate comfort.

settings.title: Low Noise (<48db)
settings.text: The high-precision transmission reduces friction,providing a quieter experience during adjustment.

settings.title: Presets:2 custom heights
settings.text: Instantly shift between two custom presets to lock in your perfect setup with the press of a button.

settings.title: Max Weight：275lb
settings.text: Designed to withstand up to 275lbs, this heavy-duty desk is built to support even the most intense gaming setups.

settings.title: Blacklyte's First Al Algorithm InteractiveLighting System
settings.description: Connect To The Game System Through PC Program,Intelligently Capture Character Movements, And TriggerResponsive Lighting Feedback.Provide Over 1000Interactive Effects As Players Dynamically Change.

settings.title: lmmersive Emotional Light Therapy
settings.description: Blacklyte Has Customized Eight Unique Scene LightingEffects Based On Research Into Emotional LightingTheory.These Effects Stimulate The Light-SensitiveAreas Of the Brain, Helping Regulate NeurotransmitterSecretion And Trigger The Emotional Explosion Point.

settings.title: Intelligent Light Control Rendering System
settings.description: Easily Select Colors And Dynamic Effects To Match YourPreferences.The System Also Allows For IndependentControl Of Duration, Ensuring Smooth ,SeamlessTransitions To Meet Your Unique Lighting Needs.

settings.main_title: BLACKLYTE pioneers AI algorithmintegration for immersive gaming experience

settings.heading: Patented Internal Alignment Technology For Table Legs
settings.content: Integrated Cable Management Power Cords Are Discreetly Hidden Within The Tablelegs To Prevent dangling, Reducing The Risk Of Tripping And Accidental Disconnection.

settings.heading: Side-Mounted Sliding Rail For Expanded Desktop Space
settings.content: The Side-Mounted Sliding Rails Allow For The Installation Of Headphone. Hooks And Other Personalized Accessories, Maximizing Desktop Space.

settings.heading: High-Strength Cold-Rolled Steel Legs
settings.content: Constructed With Automotive-Grade Cold-Rolled Steel, The Table Legs Support Up To 125kg. Ensuring Stability And Safety For All Types Of Gaming Equipment And Accessories.

settings.heading: Openable Rear Suspension Pod
settings.content:
Rear Desktop Storage Compartment Designed For Organizing Excess Cables And Bulkyequipment, The Compartment Features An Invisibleflip-Cover Design. Close The Lid For A Streamlinedclutter-Free' Zero-Cable'desktop Aesthetic.
**The power strip and magnetic cable anchors are not included in the package.

settings.text: With seamless game compatibility and regular lighting function updates,the system allows for real-time lighting control and desktop adjustments. The lighting timer can be customized to align with your work and rest schedule, adjusting automatically from morning to evening.

settings.title: Which Blacklyte desk is right for you?

settings.heading: 1. How do I track my order?
settings.content: Once your order ships, you'll receive a shipping confirmation email and tracking number, so you can follow your package as it makes its way to you. However, tracking information can take up to 24 hours to update, so don’t worry if it doesn't show up immediately. We recommend tracking your order and ensuring that you’re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: 2. When Will My Order be Shipped?
settings.content: Inventory orders are typically shipped the next business day and will be delivered within 1-5 business days.  For more information, please check our Shipping and Return Policy.

settings.heading: 3. My order has been shipped. Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.content: Unfortunately, we’re unable to cancel your order once it ships.

settings.heading: 4. Can I exchange my Order？
settings.content: For the most efficient resolution to obtain the item you desire, we recommend returning the original item. Once your return is approved, we encourage you to proceed with a separate purchase for the new item.  For more information, please check our Return & Refund Policy.

settings.heading: 5. How will my order be delivered?
settings.content: We deliver your order straight to your address via FedEx & UPS. You’ll receive an email with a tracking number when your order ships, so you can easily track your order. Please ensure that you’re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: 6. What do I do if I face an issue with my purchase?
settings.content: In the unlikely event that you come across any damaged, defective or missing parts, please contact us at support@blacklyte.com with a photo of the affected area and your order number. Our support specialists will do their best to assist you.

settings.title: Fast free shipping
settings.text: Typically shipped within 1-2 business days, with delivery taking 3-5 days.

settings.title: 30-day easy returns
settings.text: You can easily return it within 30 days.
